intro.speaker: Rhys
intro.line: Oh, Titania. So this is where you’ve been, is it?

intro.speaker: Titania
intro.line: Rhys! Are you sure you’re well enough to be up?

intro.speaker: Rhys
intro.line: Yes. My fever’s completely gone.

intro.speaker: Titania
intro.line: Are you sure? You still look a bit unsteady on your feet if you ask me.

intro.speaker: Rhys
intro.line: Well, I’ve been in bed for almost a week. I doubt anyone would be in top form–even you, my friend!

intro.speaker: Titania
intro.line: I certainly hope that’s all it is. In any case, until you’re back at full speed, you won’t be doing any work. We’re mercenaries, after all, and...

intro.speaker: Rhys
intro.line: Even the smallest lapse invites death. Right? I know, I know. My apologies to the rest of the team, then. It looks like I’ll be recuperating for a while longer.

intro.speaker: Titania
intro.line: Mm, it’s for the best. Take your time and get fully rested and restored. You are our sole staff wielder, Rhys...The harder our work, the more we depend on you to be at our sides.

intro.speaker: Rhys
intro.line: Thank you for your kind words.

intro.speaker: Titania
intro.line: Oh, by the way...That paper you’ve been carrying around...Is it a letter? I’d intended to go into town this afternoon. I can deliver it for you if you like.

intro.speaker: Rhys
intro.line: Oh, no. This letter is for you, Titania.

intro.speaker: Titania
intro.line: For me?

intro.speaker: Rhys
intro.line: Not more than a little while ago, I went out for a walk around the yard and...A man I’ve never seen before came up to me and said...Give this to the red-tressed knight.

intro.speaker: Titania
intro.line: How curious... I wonder what it is.

intro.speaker: Rhys
intro.line: I imagine it’s a thank-you letter from the people of Caldea or something to that effect.

intro.speaker: Titania
intro.line: Oh, no! How dare they!?

intro.speaker: Rhys
intro.line: Titania? What’s the matter? What did the letter say?

intro.speaker: Titania
intro.line: ...Rhys! Take this letter to Oscar, and tell him to prepare for combat and wait for me! I have to go out for a moment.

intro.speaker: Rhys
intro.line: Uh, but, Titania?

intro.speaker: Titania
intro.line: I’ll be right back! I’m counting on you!

intro.speaker: Rhys
intro.line: What on earth could that letter have said?

intro.speaker: Rhys
intro.line: Everyone! Come quickly!

intro.speaker: Boyd
intro.line: Hey, Rhys. So, how are you feeling?

intro.speaker: Oscar
intro.line: What is it? Why are you so agitated?

intro.speaker: Ike
intro.line: Has something happened?

intro.speaker: Rhys
intro.line: It’s Mist and Rolf...They...They’ve been taken by bandits!

intro.speaker: Boyd
intro.line: What?!?

intro.speaker: Ike
intro.line: What are you talking about?

intro.speaker: Oscar
intro.line: The two of them went out early this morning to gather wildflowers...Sure,they’re not back yet, but...

intro.speaker: Rhys
intro.line: Earlier, by the gate...a man asked me to deliver a letter to Titania. It was from a group of bandits–kidnappers. What are we going to do?

intro.speaker: Oscar
intro.line: Let me see it.

intro.speaker: Rhys
intro.line: Oh, if only I’d known...He didn’t seem like a bad person...

intro.speaker: Oscar
intro.line: Hm. I get it. They’re after revenge. They want retribution for the other day at that village... Caldea, was it? Hm. Taking children as hostages? What cowards!

intro.speaker: Ike
intro.line: Blast!

intro.speaker: Boyd
intro.line: Wait, Ike! Where...Where do you think you’re going?

intro.speaker: Ike
intro.line: I’m going to get Mist!

intro.speaker: Rhys
intro.line: But...No! Titania...She said she’d be right back. You’re supposed to get ready and wait for her...

intro.speaker: Ike
intro.line: And do you honestly think we’ve got time to wait? I’m going!

intro.speaker: Boyd
intro.line: What do you think you’re going to do on your own, rookie? Hold it! I’m going, too!

intro.speaker: Rhys
intro.line: Stop! Both of you! I...I’m going with you.

intro.speaker: Oscar
intro.line: Oh, c’mon! Wait! This is crazy! Do you think you can just ignore the deputy commander’s orders?

intro.speaker: Boyd
intro.line: The road forks here...Well, which way do we go?

intro.speaker: Ike
intro.line: How am I supposed to know that?

intro.speaker: Boyd
intro.line: Hold it! Are you saying you don’t know where we’re going? Unbelievable! You’d better learn to think before you act,you moron!

intro.speaker: Ike
intro.line: Shut your mouth, Boyd!

intro.speaker: Boyd
intro.line: You think you can make me? Come on!

intro.speaker: Rhys
intro.line: B-both of you, this is no time to be fighting.

intro.speaker: Oscar
intro.line: I figured we’d find you like this.

intro.speaker: Boyd
intro.line: What are you two doing? So you’re coming after all? It’s not like you two chambermaids to be disobeying orders. What’s the world coming to?

intro.speaker: Ike
intro.line: Oscar, you know this road, don’t you? Which way do we go?

intro.speaker: Oscar
intro.line: You’re going to the bandit stronghold, right? It’s the left fork.

intro.speaker: Ike
intro.line: Got it!

intro.speaker: Boyd
intro.line: I’m still talking here! Let me finish what I–

intro.speaker: Rhys
intro.line: Come on, Oscar. Let’s go, too!

intro.speaker: Oscar
intro.line: I guess we’ve no choice.

intro.speaker: Boyd
intro.line: Uh...HEY! You’re not leaving me behind!

intro.speaker: Ikanau
intro.line: So you came, did you, boys? Is it just you, then? You came alone? You seriously underestimate what we’re capable of doing to you. Now, where’s that snobby, red-haired wench you ride with?

intro.speaker: Ike
intro.line: Titania’s not here. It’s just us. All I want to know right now is whether Mist and Rolf are safe.

intro.speaker: Ikanau
intro.line: Yeah, of course. We’ve got ’em locked up safe and sound in that little shack back there. We got no problem with those brats. What we’re after is a little revenge. We want the redhead and her pups. And that’d be you boys.

intro.speaker: Boyd
intro.line: Then hurry up and let those two go! We’re here, aren’t we? You’ve got no more reason to hold them.

intro.speaker: Ikanau
intro.line: You’re here, but Red ain’t. We’ll just keep the brats until she arrives.

intro.speaker: Ike
intro.line: Dang it!

intro.speaker: Ikanau
intro.line: If you’re so impatient, I guess we can start by killing you whelps. You all ready to die? Hey! Come on out! It’s time to play, lads!

intro.speaker: Rhys
intro.line: There...There are so many...But...we must not lose!

intro.speaker: Oscar
intro.line: Rhys, move to the rear! If anyone gets injured, we’ll need you on hand with your staff.

intro.speaker: Rhys
intro.line: Understood!

intro.speaker: Ikanau
intro.line: Take ’em, lads! Without the red-haired knight, they’re no match for us!

intro.speaker: Boyd
intro.line: What’d you say, dirtbag?

intro.speaker: Ike
intro.line: We’ll make you regret those words!

battle.speaker: Ike
battle.line: Titania! I, uh... I’m sorry. I ran off on my own without...

battle.speaker: Titania
battle.line: We’ll talk about it later. For the time being, keep your mind on the battle, Ike.

battle.speaker: Mist
battle.line: Keep your chin up,Rolf! Boys aren’t supposed to cry!

battle.speaker: Rolf
battle.line: But...I’m so scared...Aren’t you even a bit scared, Mist?

battle.speaker: Mist
battle.line: Of course I am, but...Listen, we’ll be fine! My brother will definitely come rescue us.

battle.speaker: Rolf
battle.line: Mm...yeah. You’re right! And I’m sure that my brothers will be right there with him.

battle.speaker: Mist
battle.line: I’m sure they will, too! So no more crying! Got it?

battle.speaker: Titania
battle.line: I’m sure I told them to wait for me...I should have known they’d disobey orders. They have no discipline...As deputy commander of the Greil Mercenaries, I cannot allow any more of our people to be harmed.

boss.speaker: Ikanau
boss.line: Graaw! We won’t lose, not to the likes of you!

boss.speaker: Ikanau
boss.line: This...This can’t be...I don’t deserve to lose to sellswords like you...

boss.speaker: Ike
boss.line: Will you let the two of them go now?

boss.speaker: Ikanau
boss.line: Sure, you can have ’em both. If you can beat me, that is!

boss.speaker: Ikanau
boss.line: Heh heh heh. I’ve been waiting for you,you red-haired demoness. You are going to hurt–and hurt bad. This is for my mates who fell before you in Caldea!

boss.speaker: Titania
boss.line: No matter your motives, you’ve taken helpless innocents as hostages. You’re not fit to be called human. May the blessings of the goddess be kept from you for all eternity!

end.speaker: Ike
end.line: All right! Somehow we did it.

end.speaker: Boyd
end.line: Somehow? What do you mean, somehow? We did it because we’re better than them!

end.speaker: Titania
end.line: What you DID...was in direct defiance of the orders I explicitly gave you. How it all turned out is another issue altogether.

end.speaker: Oscar
end.line: Deputy Commander, I take full responsibility. The failure is mine...

end.speaker: Titania
end.line: Oscar, Rhys... What am I supposed to do with you two? Sigh...I think I’ll leave you two to the commander. He’ll know how to handle you, I’m sure. Now, let’s find Mist and Rolf.

end.speaker: Ike
end.line: According to the bandit chief, they’re in that shack back–

end.speaker: Boyd
end.line: Stop crying! You don’t need to worry! We’ll get you outta there!

end.speaker: Ike
end.line: You! Harm either of them, and I’ll see you dead!

end.speaker: Bandit
end.line: Shut up! Shut your stinking trap! If you want these two alive, you’ll throw your weapons down. If you don’t, I’ll start with the girl...

end.speaker: Titania
end.line: I’m putting down my weapons. See?

end.speaker: Titania
end.line: We’re here to save them. Now all of you back off.

end.speaker: Bandit
end.line: Heh heh heh...All right, so now you’re all unarmed. Which means...all you can do is watch while I gut this whiny brat like a fatling pig!

end.speaker: Mist
end.line: He’s fine. He just fainted is all. There’s not a scratch on him.

end.speaker: Oscar
end.line: I’m just glad to see you both alive and well...You’re both so brave.

end.speaker: Ike
end.line: This guy’s dead. This arrow–who shot it?

end.speaker: Shinon
end.line: A single arrow, right between the eyes? Who else could make a shot like that? No one, that’s who!

end.speaker: Shinon
end.line: Don’t you children owe me a little gratitude? I did just save your lives.

end.speaker: Gatrie
end.line: Deputy Commander...Shinon...hah...hah...You’re both so cruel. With this armor on, you know I can’t run that fast...

end.speaker: Rhys
end.line: So, that’s where you went, Titania?

end.speaker: Titania
end.line: Of course. I knew we’d need reinforcements. I’m glad it wasn’t a waste of time.

end.speaker: Shinon
end.line: In the end, I got to feather someone. So it was worth the rush.

end.speaker: Ike
end.line: Mist...You did well, Sis. You must have been frightened.

end.speaker: Mist
end.line: Uh-huh...Uh-unh! I never stopped believing. I knew that you and the others would come and rescue us. I knew you’d come! So, I was fine!

end.speaker: Ike
end.line: Really? That’s an improvement on your usual sobbing and nose-running.

end.speaker: Mist
end.line: You jerk! I...My nose does not run!

end.speaker: Titania
end.line: All right, come on! Let’s head for home. My goodness...What a day this has been.
